entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:03 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 10:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
